00027 CmdIssuer::CmdIssuer()
00028 {
00029     Request *req = new Request();
00030     prevState.prevCmdTime = 0;
00031     prevState.prevCmdRank = NO_OF_RANKS+1;
00032     prevState.prevCmdBank = NO_OF_BANKS+1;
00033     prevState.cmd.set(PRECHARGE,NORMAL,*req);    
00034     busBusy = 0;
00035     generated_start_event = false;
00036     delete req;                 
00037 }

00051 /*
00052  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053  *       Class:  CmdIssuer
00054  *      Method:  process_event
00055  * Description:  constructor
00056  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057  */
00058 void CmdIssuer::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00059 {   
00060     bool isWrite = false;
00061     switch (e->type)
00062     {
00063         case START:
00064             
00065             ((BusHandler*)parent)->SetIfFull();
00066             ((BusHandler*)parent)->linkBusy[Id] = false;        
00067             generated_start_event = false;
00068             if (HasWork())
00069             {
00070                 DRAMCmdState *cmd = new DRAMCmdState();
00071                 if (IssueCmd(&isWrite,cmd))     
00072                 {
00073 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00074                     cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << cmd->req.address << ": Issuing " << dec << cmd->cmd << " with following isWrite signal " << isWrite << endl;      
00075 #endif  
00076                     if (cmd->cmd == READ || cmd->cmd == WRITE)
00077                     {   
00078                         cmd->req.busInsertionTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now()+1; 
00079                     }
00080 
00081                     if( dram_page_policy == OPEN_PAGE_POLICY )
00082                     {
00083                         if (cmd->cmd == READ || cmd->cmd == WRITE)
00084                         {
00085                             cout << "hhh" << endl;
00086                             ((BusHandler*)parent)->oneReq[cmd->req.channelNo][cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] = false;
00087                         }
00088                     }
00089                     else if ( dram_page_policy == CLOSE_PAGE_POLICY )
00090                     {
00091                         if (cmd->cmd == PRECHARGE)
00092                         {
00093                             cout << "hahaha" << endl;
00094                             ((BusHandler*)parent)->oneReq[cmd->req.channelNo][cmd->req.rankNo][cmd->req.bankNo] = false;
00095                         }
00096                     }
00097                     else
00098                     {
00099                         cout << " Error: Undefine DRAM page policy " << endl;
00100                         exit(1);
00101                     }
00102 
00103                     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00104                     event->src = (Component*)this;
00105                     event->dst = (Component*)cmdBus;
00106                     event->event_data.push_back((void*)cmd);    //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links
00107                     event->type = START;
00108                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &CmdBusHandler::process_event, (CmdBusHandler*)event->dst, event);
00109                 }
00110                 else 
00111                    delete cmd;
00112                 
00113                 if (isWrite)
00114                 {
00115                     DRAMCmdState *cmd2 = new DRAMCmdState();
00116                     *cmd2 = *cmd;       
00117                     IrisEvent *event3 = new IrisEvent();
00118                     Time delay = CalculateDataDelay(*cmd2);
00119                     event3->src = (Component*)this;
00120                     event3->dst = (Component*)dataBus;
00121                     event3->event_data.push_back((void*)cmd2);  //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links
00122                     event3->type = START_WRITE;
00123                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+delay+1, &DataBusHandler::process_event, (DataBusHandler*)event3->dst, event3);
00124                     // issue Data Bus Command as well if write
00125                 }
00126                 
00127         //      if (HasWork())
00128             if( !generated_start_event)
00129                 {
00130                     generated_start_event = true;
00131                 IrisEvent *event2 = new IrisEvent();
00132                 event2->src = (Component*)this;
00133                 event2->dst = (Component*)this; 
00134                 event2->type = START;
00135                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &CmdIssuer::process_event, (CmdIssuer*)event2->dst, event2);
00136                 }
00137         //      else
00138         //          ((BusHandler*)parent)->SetIfFull(); 
00139             }      
00140             break;      
00141 
00142         default:
00143                  //cerr <<  "CmdIssuer There should be no default case as such but OK /n";
00144         break;
00145     }
00146     delete e;
00147 }

00149 bool CmdIssuer::HasWork()
00150 {
00151     return (!((BusHandler*)parent)->cmdQueue[bufferId].empty());
00152 }

00154 std::string CmdIssuer::toString()
00155 {
00156         return "CmdIssuer";

00158 
00159 bool CmdIssuer::IssueCmd(bool *isWrite, DRAMCmdState *scheduledCmd)
00160 {
00161         DRAMCmdState prevCmd;
00162         bool temp = false;
00163         vector<DRAMCmdState>::iterator bufferIndex = ((BusHandler*)parent)->cmdQueue[bufferId].begin();
00164         BusHandler * parent2 = ((BusHandler*)parent);
00165         *isWrite = false;
00166         prevCmd = prevState.cmd;
00167 
00168         for (unsigned int i=0; i<parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId].size(); i++)
00169         {       
00170             if (!BusNotBusy(parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i]) )//&&               // Check whether Data Bus is busy only for Read & Write cmds
00171             {   bufferIndex++;
00172                 continue;
00173             }
00174             if (!BanksFirstReq(parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i],i)        )//&&   // Low Level cmds within a bank has to be serialized
00175             {   bufferIndex++;
00176                 continue;
00177             }
00178             if (BankNotBusy(parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i]) )           // Check whether the bank is busy or not
00179             {           
00180                 if (CanSchedule(parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i],prevCmd))
00181                 {       // Check the timing constraints with last cmd   
00182                     *scheduledCmd = parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i];  // issue command to command bus
00183                     if (parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i].cmd==WRITE)
00184                         *isWrite = true;
00185                     SetPrevState(parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i]);
00186                     SetBusBusyTime(*scheduledCmd);              
00187                     parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId].erase(bufferIndex);     // erase the scheduled command;
00188                     temp = true;
00189                     break;
00190                  }      
00191              }
00192              bufferIndex++;
00193         }
00194         return temp;    
00195 }
00196 
00197 bool CmdIssuer::BusNotBusy(DRAMCmdState currentCmd)
00198 {
00199 
00200     if (currentCmd.cmd == READ || currentCmd.cmd == WRITE)
00201     {
00202         Time temp;
00203         if (currentCmd.cmd == WRITE && prevBusCmd == READ)         
00204             temp = (ullint)busBusy+t_CMD;
00205         else if (currentCmd.cmd == READ && prevBusCmd == WRITE)    
00206             temp = (ullint)busBusy+t_CMD;
00207         else if (currentCmd.cmd == READ || currentCmd.cmd == WRITE)
00208             temp = busBusy;
00209     
00210          if (temp<=Simulator::Now())
00211             return true;
00212         else 
00213             return false;
00214     }
00215     else
00216         return true;
00217                         
00218 }
00219 
00220 void CmdIssuer::SetBusBusyTime(DRAMCmdState currentCmd)
00221 {
00222   //  if (currentCmd.cmd == WRITE && prevBusCmd == READ)           
00223     //  busBusy = Simulator::Now()+CalculateBurstL(currentCmd);
00224 //    else if (currentCmd.cmd == READ && prevBusCmd == WRITE)      
00225 //      busBusy = Simulator::Now()+CalculateBurstL(currentCmd);
00226     if (currentCmd.cmd == READ || currentCmd.cmd == WRITE)
00227     {   
00228         busBusy = (ullint)Simulator::Now()+CalculateBurstL(currentCmd);
00229         prevBusCmd  = currentCmd.cmd;
00230     }
00231 }

00233 bool CmdIssuer::BanksFirstReq(DRAMCmdState currentCmd, unsigned int index)
00234 {
00235     BusHandler * parent2 = ((BusHandler*)parent);       
00236     for (unsigned int i=0; i<index; i++)
00237     {
00238         if (parent2->cmdQueue[bufferId][i].req.bankNo == currentCmd.req.bankNo)
00239             return false;       
00240     }
00241     return true;         
00242 }

00244 bool CmdIssuer::BankNotBusy(DRAMCmdState currentCmd)
00245 {
00246    if (currentCmd.cmd == ALL_BANK_REFRESH /*&& currentCmd.req.rankNo == prevState.prevCmdRank*/)
00247    {
00248         for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_BANKS; i++)
00249         {
00250             Time prevTime = prevState.rank[currentCmd.req.rankNo].bank[i].prevCmdTime;
00251             DRAMCmd prevCmd = prevState.rank[currentCmd.req.rankNo].bank[i].prevCmd;
00252     
00253             Time prevBurstL = CalculateBurstL(prevState.cmd);   
00254             Time busyTime = CalculateBusyTime(currentCmd.cmd, prevCmd, SAME, SAME, prevBurstL);
00255 
00256         if (prevTime+busyTime>Simulator::Now()) 
00257             return false;
00258         }
00259         return true;
00260    }
00261    else
00262 //      if (currentCmd.req.rankNo == prevState.prevCmdRank && currentCmd.req.bankNo == prevState.prevCmdBank)
00263     {           
00264         Time prevTime = prevState.rank[currentCmd.req.rankNo].bank[currentCmd.req.bankNo].prevCmdTime;
00265         DRAMCmd prevCmd = prevState.rank[currentCmd.req.rankNo].bank[currentCmd.req.bankNo].prevCmd;
00266 //      if (prevTime+CmdDelay(prevCmd)<=Simulator::Now())
00267 //          return true;
00268 //      else
00269 //          return false;       
00270     
00271         Time prevBurstL = CalculateBurstL(prevState.cmd);       
00272         Time busyTime = CalculateBusyTime(currentCmd.cmd, prevCmd, SAME, SAME, prevBurstL);
00273 
00274         if (prevTime+busyTime<=Simulator::Now()) 
00275             return true;
00276         else
00277             return false;
00278    }
00279 }
00280 
00281 Time CmdIssuer::CmdDelay(DRAMCmd cmd)
00282 {
00283     Time cmdTime = 0;
00285     if (cmd == ACTIVATE)
00286         cmdTime = (ullint)t_RCD;
00287     else if (cmd == PRECHARGE)
00288         cmdTime = t_RP;
00289     else if (cmd == READ || cmd == WRITE)
00290         cmdTime = t_CAS;
00291     else if (cmd == ALL_BANK_REFRESH)
00292         cmdTime = t_RFC;
00293                 
00294     return cmdTime;
00295 }
00296 
00297 Time CmdIssuer::CalculateDataDelay(DRAMCmdState cmdS)
00298 {
00299     Time delay = 0; 
00300     if (cmdS.cmd == WRITE)
00301     {
00302         delay = t_CWD+t_CMD;
00303     }
00304     else
00305         cout << "Error: calculating data bus delay for non write cmd\n";
00306     return delay;       
00307 }
00308 
00309 bool CmdIssuer::CanSchedule(DRAMCmdState currentCmd, DRAMCmdState prevCmd)
00310 {
00311     RankBankComb rankC;
00312     RankBankComb bankC;
00313     Time prevTime = prevState.prevCmdTime;              
00314 
00315     if (currentCmd.req.rankNo==prevCmd.req.rankNo)
00316         rankC = SAME;
00317     else 
00318         rankC = DIFF;
00319         
00320     if (currentCmd.req.bankNo==prevCmd.req.bankNo)
00321         bankC = SAME;
00322     else 
00323         bankC = DIFF;
00324 
00325     Time prevBurstL = CalculateBurstL(prevCmd); 
00326     Time busyTime = CalculateBusyTime(currentCmd.cmd, prevCmd.cmd, rankC, bankC, prevBurstL);
00327 
00328     if (prevTime+busyTime<=Simulator::Now()) 
00329         return true;
00330     else
00331         return false;
00332 }
00333 
00334 Time CmdIssuer::CalculateBurstL(DRAMCmdState prevCmd)
00335 {
00336     Time t_Burst = 0;   
00337     switch (prevCmd.burst)
00338     {
00339         case READL:
00340             t_Burst = (ullint)ceil(ceil(READ_SIZE/DDR_BUS_WIDTH)*BUS_CYCLE); 
00341             break;
00342         case WRITEL:
00343             t_Burst = (ullint)ceil(ceil(WRITE_SIZE/DDR_BUS_WIDTH)*BUS_CYCLE);   
00344             break;
00345         case PREFETCHL:
00346             t_Burst = (ullint)ceil(ceil(PREFETCH_SIZE/DDR_BUS_WIDTH)*BUS_CYCLE);        
00347             break;
00348         case WRITEBACKL:
00349             t_Burst = (ullint)ceil(ceil(WRITEBACK_SIZE/DDR_BUS_WIDTH)*BUS_CYCLE); 
00350             break; 
00351          default:
00352              break;
00353     }
00354     return t_Burst;
00355 }
00356 
00357 Time CmdIssuer::CalculateBusyTime(DRAMCmd curCmd, DRAMCmd prevCmd, RankBankComb rankC, RankBankComb bankC, Time prevBurstL)
00358 {
00359     Time busyTime=0;
00360     Time t_Burst = prevBurstL;
00361     busyTime += t_CMD;  
00362 
00363     switch (prevCmd)
00364     {
00365         case ACTIVATE:
00366             switch(curCmd)
00367             {
00368                 case ACTIVATE:
00369                     switch(rankC)
00370                     {
00371                         case SAME:
00372                             switch(bankC)
00373                             {   
00374                                 case SAME:
00375                                     busyTime = 999999; // infinity      
00376                                     //   cout << "Should not do activate and activate again to same bank\n";//busyTime = t_RC;
00377                                     break;
00378                                 case DIFF:
00379                                     busyTime = t_RRD;  
00380                                     break;      
00381                                 default:
00382                                     break; 
00383                             }                       
00384                             break;
00385                         default:
00386                             break;
00387                     }
00388                     break;
00389                 case PRECHARGE:
00390                     switch(rankC)
00391                     {
00392                         case SAME:
00393                             switch(bankC)
00394                             {   
00395                                 case SAME:
00396                                     busyTime = t_RAS;
00397                                     break;
00398                                 default:
00399                                     break; 
00400                             }
00401                             break;
00402                         default:
00403                             break;
00404                     }
00405                     break;
00406                 case READ:
00407                     switch(rankC)
00408                     {
00409                         case SAME:
00410                             switch(bankC)
00411                             {   
00412                                 case SAME:
00413                                     busyTime = t_RCD-t_AL;
00414                                     break;
00415                                 default:
00416                                     break; 
00417                             }
00418                             break;
00419                         default:
00420                             break;
00421                     }
00422 
00423                     break;
00424                 case WRITE:
00425                     switch(rankC)
00426                     {
00427                         case SAME:
00428                             switch(bankC)
00429                             {   
00430                                 case SAME:
00431                                     busyTime = t_RCD-t_AL;
00432                                     break;
00433                                 default:
00434                                     break; 
00435                             }
00436                             break;
00437                         default:
00438                             break;
00439                     }
00440                     break;
00441                 case ALL_BANK_REFRESH:
00442                     switch(rankC)
00443                     {
00444                         case SAME:
00445                             busyTime = t_RAS;
00446                             break;
00447                         default:
00448                             break;
00449                     }
00450                     break;
00451                 default:
00452                     break;      
00453             }
00454             break;
00455         case PRECHARGE:
00456             switch(curCmd)
00457             {
00458                 case ACTIVATE:
00459                     switch(rankC)
00460                     {
00461                         case SAME:
00462                             switch(bankC)
00463                             {   
00464                                 case DIFF:      
00465                                     busyTime = t_RP;
00466                                     break;
00467                                 default:
00468                                     break;
00469                             }     
00470                             break;
00471                         default:
00472                             break;
00473                     }

00546             break;
00547         case READ:
00548             switch(curCmd)
00549             {
00550                 case ACTIVATE:
00551                     switch(rankC)
00552                     {
00553                         case SAME:
00554                             switch(bankC)
00555                             {   
00556                                 case SAME:
00557                                     busyTime = 999999; // infinity      
00558                                     //cout << "ACTIVATE: after READ: to the same bank: cannot happen\n";
00559                                     break;
00560                                 default:
00561                                     break; 
00562                             }
00563                             break;
00564                         default:
00565                             break;
00566                     }
00567                     break;
00568                 case PRECHARGE:
00569                     switch(rankC)
00570                     {
00571                         case SAME:
00572                             switch(bankC)
00573                             {   
00574                                 case SAME:
00575                                     busyTime = (t_AL + t_Burst + t_RTP - t_CCD); 
00576                                     break;
00577                                 default:
00578                                     break; 
00579                             }
00580                             break;
00581                         default:
00582                             break;
00583                     }
00584                     break;
00585                 case READ:
00586                     switch(rankC)
00587                     {
00588                         case SAME:
00589                             busyTime = Max(t_Burst,t_CCD);
00590                             break;
00591                         case DIFF:
00592                             busyTime = Max(t_Burst,t_CCD) + t_RTRS; 
00593                             break;
00594                         default:
00595                             break;
00596                     }
00597                     break;
00598                 case WRITE:
00599                     busyTime = t_CAS + t_Burst + t_RTRS - t_CWD; 
00600                     break;
00601                 case ALL_BANK_REFRESH:
00602                     switch(rankC)
00603                     {
00604                         case SAME:
00605                             busyTime = (t_AL + t_Burst + t_RTP - t_CCD); 
00606                             break;
00607                         default:
00608                             break;
00609                     }
00610                     break;
00611                 default:
00612                     break;      
00613             }
00614             break;
00615         case WRITE:
00616             switch(curCmd)
00617             {
00618                 case ACTIVATE:
00619                     switch(rankC)
00620                     {
00621                         case SAME:
00622                             switch(bankC)
00623                             {   
00624                                 case SAME:
00625                                     busyTime = 999999; // infinity
00626                                     //cout << "Activate After WRITE: to the same bank cannot happen\n";
00627                                     break;
00628                                 default:
00629                                     break; 
00630                             }
00631                             break;
00632                         default:
00633                             break;
00634                     }
00635                     break;
00636                 case PRECHARGE:
00637                     switch(rankC)
00638                     {
00639                         case SAME:
00640                             switch(bankC)
00641                             {   
00642                                 case SAME:
00643                                     busyTime = t_AL + t_Burst + t_CWD + t_WR;
00644                                     break;      
00645                                 default:
00646                                     break; 
00647                             }
00648                             break;
00649                         default:
00650                             break;
00651                     }
00652                     break;
00653                 case READ:
00654                     switch(rankC)
00655                     {
00656                         case SAME:
00657                             busyTime = t_CWD + t_Burst + t_WTR;
00658                             break;
00659                         case DIFF:
00660                             busyTime = t_CWD + t_Burst + t_RTRS - t_CAS;
00661                             break;
00662                         default:
00663                             break;
00664                     }
00665                     break;
00666                 case WRITE:
00667                     switch(rankC)
00668                     {
00669                         case SAME:
00670                             busyTime = Max(t_Burst, t_CCD);
00671                             break;
00672                         case DIFF:
00673                             busyTime = Max(t_Burst, t_CCD) + t_OST;
00674                             break;
00675                         default:
00676                             break;
00677                     }
00678                     break;
00679                 case ALL_BANK_REFRESH:
00680                     switch(rankC)
00681                     {
00682                         case SAME:
00683                             busyTime = t_AL + t_Burst + t_CWD + t_WR;
00684                             break;
00685                         default:
00686                             break;
00687                     }
00688                     break;
00689                 default:
00690                     break;      
00691             }
00692             break;
00693         case ALL_BANK_REFRESH:
00694             switch(rankC)
00695             {
00696                 case DIFF:
00697                     busyTime = t_RTRS;
00698                     break;
00699                 case SAME:
00700                     if(dram_page_policy == OPEN_PAGE_POLICY)
00701                         busyTime = t_RP + t_RFC + t_RCD;        // First precharge the active row and then refresh and then activate the row again
00702                     else if (dram_page_policy == CLOSE_PAGE_POLICY)
00703                         busyTime = t_RFC;       
00704                     else
00705                     {
00706                         cout << " Error: Undefine DRAM page policy " << endl;
00707                         exit(1);
00708                     }
00709                 default:
00710                     break;
00711             }   
00712             break;
00713         default:
00714             break;
00715     }   
00716     return busyTime;
00717 }
00718 
00719 void CmdIssuer::SetPrevState(DRAMCmdState currentCmd)
00720 {
00721     prevState.prevCmdRank = currentCmd.req.rankNo;
00722     prevState.prevCmdBank = currentCmd.req.bankNo;
00723     prevState.prevCmdTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now();
00724     prevState.cmd = currentCmd;
00725 
00726     prevState.rank[currentCmd.req.rankNo].bank[currentCmd.req.bankNo].prevRow = currentCmd.req.rowNo;
00727     prevState.rank[currentCmd.req.rankNo].bank[currentCmd.req.bankNo].prevCmd = currentCmd.cmd;
00728     prevState.rank[currentCmd.req.rankNo].bank[currentCmd.req.bankNo].prevCmdTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now(); 
00729 }
00730 
00731 Time CmdIssuer::Max(Time t1, Time t2)
00732 {
00733     if (t1>=t2)
00734         return t1;
00735     else 
00736         return t2;
00737 }
